title: Bloomberg Markets: Forester on Impact of Geopolitical Events
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Forester on Impact of Geopolitical Events
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Matthew Forester Chief Investment Officer BNY Mellon's Lockwood Advisors Discussing how the markets are impacted by events like the shooting a top GOP congressman and several others Wednesday in Alexandria, Virginia.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
